name: Crinaea
description: The Crinaea is characterized by its aquatic nature with a slightly humanoid appearance, capable of becoming invisible when submerged in water.
memorable: It can poison water sources from a distance and turn invisible while submerged, presenting a strategic threat.
goals: To guard its water source and use its abilities to ambush and poison its foes.
relations: Typically found in areas near water, it may encounter other water-dwelling fey or creatures.
environment: Aquatic environments or near water sources.
strengths: Excellent stealth and the unique ability to poison water from a distance.
weaknesses: Becomes fatigued if away from its water source for too long.
attacks: Uses a dagger attack that deals both piercing and cold damage.
most_powerful_ability: Crinaea’s Curse allows it to poison nearby water, causing significant damage and the poisoned condition.
senses: It has an average passive perception of 13.
skills: Notable for its stealth, providing it advantageous ambush potential.
additional_information: Innate spellcaster with a focus on poison and utility spells.
Can create or destroy water, enhancing its control over the environment.
Transforms into an invisible form when fully submerged.
spellcasting: Can cast poison spray at will; also versatile with several utility spells including fog cloud and protection from poison.
test_queries: clever aquatic fey that poisons water
skilled stealthy fey near water sources
poisonous fey creature with aquatic abilities
